evals.prompt: I've got this massive spec document for our API migration (api-migration-spec.md). It's like 800 lines with mermaid diagrams and task checklists. Can you turn it into something I can actually browse?
evals.expected_output: A single .jsx React artifact rendering the spec as an interactive UI with collapsible sections, ToC sidebar, rendered mermaid diagrams, and checklist progress.

evals.prompt: Visualize the spec please — there are two files: phase-1-design.md and phase-2-implementation.md
evals.expected_output: A React artifact with file tabs to switch between the two specs, plus all SpecObserver features.

evals.prompt: this plan is way too hard to read. I keep losing track of which tasks are done in each phase. can you render it as a nicer UI?
evals.expected_output: Agent reads the spec and generates a SpecObserver artifact with checklist progress tracking and collapsible phases.

evals.prompt: Hey, I need to update the README.md for our open source project — can you help me rewrite the installation section to be clearer?
evals.expected_output: Agent helps rewrite the README section. This is a documentation editing task, not a spec visualization task.

evals.prompt: Can you create a markdown document that outlines the architecture for our new payment service?
evals.expected_output: Agent creates a new spec document. This is content creation, not visualization of an existing spec.

evals.prompt: I have 4 spec files for the data pipeline project. show me the spec observer view so I can navigate between them during our review meeting
evals.expected_output: A React artifact with 4 file tabs and full SpecObserver UI.

evals.prompt: render this markdown as a nice preview so I can see how it looks before pushing to GitHub
evals.expected_output: Agent renders a simple markdown preview. This is a preview/formatting task, not spec-driven development visualization.

evals.prompt: I need to read through the technical-design-doc.md but it has like 30 sections with sequence diagrams. make it browsable with search
evals.expected_output: A SpecObserver artifact with search, collapsible sections, and rendered sequence diagrams.

evals.prompt: Convert my spec.md into a PowerPoint presentation for the stakeholder meeting
evals.expected_output: Agent creates a .pptx file from the spec content. This is a format conversion, not a spec viewer.

evals.prompt: observe the spec — it's the project-plan.md file I uploaded. I want to see the full structure at a glance
evals.expected_output: A SpecObserver artifact showing the full document structure with expandable sections and ToC.
